title: Textile, ca. 1920
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a plain compound foundation (velvet)
creditline: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
description: Broad vertical stripes of solid cut velvet alternating with narrow gold satin stripes. The left half has blue stripes and the right has green.
